K10D0260_H0262:57b-18: tshad gzung bar mi nus so; ;de lta bas na
K10D0260_H0262:57b-19: / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni /
K10D0260_H0262:57b-20: thabs dang ye shes kyi yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no //
K10D0260_H0262:57b-21: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chen po dang ldan no //
K10D0260_H0262:57b-23: rigs kyi bu de'i yan lag gi mchog mgo bo
K10D0260_H0262:57b-24: la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dug
K10D0260_H0262:57b-25: par snang ngo // de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus
K10D0260_H0262:57b-26: pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K10D0260_H0262:57b-27: chen po nam mkha'i snying po la ngo mtshar thob
K10D0260_H0262:57b-28: par snang ngo // / rmad du byung ba thob /
K10D0260_H0262:57b-29: bla ma la bkur sti dang /
K10D0260_H0262:58a-1: thob par gyur nas thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar
K10D0260_H0262:58a-2: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
K10D0260_H0262:58a-3: mkha'i snying po la mchod pa dang /
K10D0260_H0262:58a-4: bkur sti sna tshogs kyis bkur stir byed /
K10D0260_H0262:58a-19: sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byed do //
K10D0260_H0262:58a-20: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po des kyang
K10D0260_H0262:58a-21: de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phul lo;
K10D0260_H0262:58a-22: ;phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal
K10D0260_H0262:58a-25: nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
K10D0260_H0262:58a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can ma rig pa'i
K10D0260_H0262:58a-27: mun pa chen pos rmongs pa rnams la sangs rgyas
K10D0260_H0262:58a-28: kyi don bgyi bar ji ltar rngo thogs lags /
K10D0260_H0262:58a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; 'di lta ste /
K10D0260_H0262:58a-34: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa /
K10D0260_H0262:58a-37: nam mkha' la rlung gi rkyen gyis rdul 'thul zhing
K10D0260_H0262:58a-38: rlung gis dkrugs pas yongs su ma dag pa'i mtshan
K10D0260_H0262:58a-40: zhi bar byed cing dri ma med la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K10D0260_H0262:58b-3: zla ba'i bye brag mi mngon na ni /
K10D0260_H0262:58b-10: lo rnams kyi bgrang ba'ang mi mngon no //
K10D0260_H0262:58b-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i don dam pa
K10D0260_H0262:58b-13: stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sems ni
K10D0260_H0262:58b-14: / rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i yongs su dag pa yin mod kyi /
K10D0260_H0262:58b-15: sems can rnams kyi glo bur du byung ba'i nye
K10D0260_H0262:58b-16: ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis sems nye bar nyon
K10D0260_H0262:58b-18: de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje
K10D0260_H0262:58b-19: chen po chu dang mtshungs pas chos 'chad par mdzad
K10D0260_H0262:58b-20: do // sems nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i
K10D0260_H0262:58b-21: sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar mdzad
K10D0260_H0262:58b-22: pas yongs su dag pa dang /
K10D0260_H0262:58b-23: de dag gi sems dri ma med par 'gyur te /
K10D0260_H0262:58b-24: de'i phyir sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K10D0260_H0262:58b-25: nyi ma shar nas ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis
K10D0260_H0262:58b-27: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du 'gyur te /
K10D0260_H0262:58b-29: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas 'phags pa'i
K10D0260_H0262:58b-30: lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur
K10D0260_H0262:58b-31: ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0260_H0262:58b-32: sems can thams cad snying rje nyid la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0260_H0262:59a-1: du dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0260_H0262:59a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0260_H0262:59a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0260_H0262:59a-5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
K10D0260_H0262:59a-8: nam mkha' mig la gnas sam /
K10D0260_H0262:59a-12: ci mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas sam /
K10D0260_H0262:59a-15: ci mig gis kun tu reg pa la gnas sam /
K10D0260_H0262:59a-18: gang yang nang du mig gis kun tu reg pa'i
K10D0260_H0262:59a-19: rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam
K10D0260_H0262:59a-23: de bzhin du rna ba dang /
K10D0260_H0262:59a-29: nam mkha' yid la gnas pa nas yid kyis kun
K10D0260_H0262:59a-30: tu rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba
K10D0260_H0262:59a-31: de la nam mkha' gnas sam /
K10D0260_H0262:59a-33: bcom ldan 'das; de ma lags so //
K10D0260_H0262:59a-36: sems can nam mkha' la gnas sam /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-0: rigs @59b kyi bu; 'di ji snyam du sems /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-1: nam mkha' sems can la gnas sam /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-5: de skad cig bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-6: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K10D0260_H0262:59b-7: chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol
K10D0260_H0262:59b-9: gcig la gcig mi rten to //
K10D0260_H0262:59b-10: gcig la gcig spyod yul ma lags so //
K10D0260_H0262:59b-17: de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-20: rang gi mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-28: rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-30: rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so //
K10D0260_H0262:59b-32: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la de ltar rtogs na /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-33: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0260_H0262:59b-35: bcom ldan 'das; bya ba r'a dza /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-38: dza na ni ma mu ni ha ra /
K10D0260_H0262:59b-41: ni ya ma su ri n'a ya /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-3: sha ma tse ta n'a ya /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-4: kle sh'anta sam sho sha ne sv'a h'a /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-8: khyod kyis mig las rgyal bar byed pa'i sengge'i 'gros
K10D0260_H0262:60a-9: kyi phyir bsgyings pa'i gzungs 'dis sems can dag 'chi
K10D0260_H0262:60a-10: ba'i tshe tha ma'i rnam par shes pa la nyon
K10D0260_H0262:60a-13: chos kyi sgrib pa yod pa sbrug pa dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gtong nus so //
K10D0260_H0262:60a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-18: sems can rnams la snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-23: rgyal po'i pho brang du gzugs dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-25: spyod lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdos de sna tshogs 'chad pa dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-26: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-27: rgyal rigs gdol pa nas dge sbyong gdol ba'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las spang ba dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-28: thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhag par nus so //
K10D0260_H0262:60a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-30: mi'i skye rgu dpag tu med /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-31: grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60a-33: bzod pa sna tshogs thob par gyur to //
K10D0260_H0262:60b-0: gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la @60b ye shes skyes par gyur to //
K10D0260_H0262:60b-2: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10D0260_H0262:60b-3: sems can dag gi gang dag rtsod 'gyur ba //
K10D0260_H0262:60b-4: de dag gi ni gzhi yi rtsa ba spongs //
K10D0260_H0262:60b-5: myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba dag gis ni //
K10D0260_H0262:60b-6: rtsa ba'i gzhi por thams cad 'gyur bar gyis //
K10D0260_H0262:60b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10D0260_H0262:60b-11: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K10D0260_H0262:60b-12: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
